Uses of Interface
clock.Cinterface

  • Packages that use Cinterface 
    Package Description
    clock
    Contains code for periodic updates (for frames).
    world
    Contains the model of the game, controlling how things move, detecting collisions, creating and destroying objects, and more...

    • Uses of Cinterface in clock

      Methods in clock with parameters of type Cinterface 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Clock.setInterface(Cinterface iI)
      Say that you wanted to switch updates between two different interfaces, one should use this to set a new one.
      Constructors in clock with parameters of type Cinterface 
      Constructor and Description
      Clock(float fFps, Cinterface iC)
      Creates the Clock Object

    • Uses of Cinterface in world

      Classes in world that implement Cinterface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SimpleWorld
      Holds the camera and interfaces with the projector which controls the frame rate.
